thread.section_title: Renaissance Beijing Wangfujing Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely Room and Helpful Door Staff - Review
thread.title_full: Lovely Room and Helpful Door Staff - Review of Renaissance Beijing Wangfujing Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: chrisnpg
title: Lovely Room and Helpful Door Staff - Review
text:
I just had a my first trip into Beijing and stayed here for 3 nights. I was upgraded to a lovely room on the 16th floor with a lovely view of the capital complex and the forbidden city. I also loved the bathtub that shared that view!
Lounge was nice although a bit busy for breakfast but the hotel was full so that happens. The gym was nice as well.
The door staff was very helpful in getting cars as since Uber (global app) went away it makes using taxi's a real pain in the... DiDi / Uber China both require a PRC domiciled credit card / phone so without those you are stuck.
I would probably stay next time closer to Sanlitun as that was where I was coming from every night but live and learn on that one.
